titles.title: Your Faithfulness Is Great, O God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your faithfulness is great, O God.
Your faithfulness is beyond compare.
There is no one else like you, blessed Lord.
Great is your faithfulness, O God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tu fidelidad es grande,
Tu fidelidad incomparable es.
Nadie es como tu, bendito Dios.
Grande es tu fidelidad.
